baseline_groups.claim_summary: Hot days (days with max temperature >= 32C) increase the overall mortality rate in Mexican municipalities.
baseline_groups.notes: Single baseline: Panel FE with muni_id + year_month FE, cold_days and precip controls, clustered at muni_id. Coef 0.0058, p<0.001.

global_notes: 64 specs total. 14 heterogeneity specs, 2 alt-outcome specs, 3 alt-treatment specs, and 2 placebo tests classified as non-core (21 total non-core). 43 core specs test the baseline claim through FE, controls, sample, inference, functional form, and method variations. The all_temp_bins spec changes treatment_var to scale_32_p_m but conceptually measures the same heat effect.
